scripts.build:dep: mkdirp target && mkdirp app/scripts && bower --config.directory=target/bower_components install && bowcat target -o app/scripts/
scripts.dist:dep: mkdirp target/bowcat && mkdirp target/dist/app/scripts && bower --config.directory=target/bower_components install && bowcat target -o target/bowcat && uglifyjs target/bowcat/build.js > target/dist/app/scripts/build.js
scripts.dist:style: mkdirp target/dist/app/styles && lessc app/less/styles.less | cssmin > target/dist/app/styles/styles.css
scripts.dist:script: mkdirp target/dist/app/scripts && jshint --config config/.jshintrc --exclude app/scripts/ --reporter=checkstyle app > target/jshint.xml && npm run dist:validate:script && node config/build/uglify.js app/**/*.js:target/dist -e app/scripts/build.js
scripts.build: npm run build:dep && npm run build:html && npm run build:style && npm run build:script && npm run build:image
scripts.dist: mkdirp target && rimraf target && npm run dist:dep && npm run dist:html && npm run dist:style && npm run dist:script && npm run dist:image && karma start config/karma.dist.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:single: rimraf target/coverage && rimraf target/test-results && karma start config/karma.conf.js  --single-run
scripts.test:watch: rimraf target/coverage && rimraf target/test-results && karma start config/karma.conf.js
scripts.build:serve: npm run build && npm run open-browser & http-server -a localhost -p 9000 -c-1
scripts.dist:serve: npm run dist && npm run open-browser & http-server target/dist/ -a localhost -p 9000 -c-1
